Package org.joone.edit

Interface Summary
ChartInterface This interface declares the methods needed to implement a multi-series charting component.
GenericFigure  
NetStorageFormat Interface to define a storage format.
UpdatableFigure Interface implemented by all figures that can have updated their some contened value
